channel.title: Projects on Yale Undergraduate Quantum Computing
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Yale Undergraduate Quantum Computing

item.title: Project Ideas
item.description: Please enter your project ideas here: forms.gle/93Nfbqi15hT6x1bM7 Join our discord to discuss ideas with members. Please email yaleqc@yale.edu to get an invite link! Much more coming soon… Event Ideas Yale QC Hackathon Yale Quantum Institute Sponsorship IBM Sponsorship Partnership with Stanford Open Source Project Ideas Surface Code Encoder and MWPM Decoder Talk Ideas Tutorial Ideas Resource Ideas

item.title: Qiskit Surface Code Encoder and MWPM Decoder
item.description: Please check out this Surface Code Encoder and Minimum Weight Perfect Matching Decoder created by members Shantanu Jha ‘21, Henry Liu ‘21 and Will Sun ‘22 for IBM Qiskit Ignis. Here is the Github repo: https://github.com/Phionx/qiskit_surface_codes This open-source package was presented at the November 2020 Qiskit Advocate Demo Session and is pending official incorporating into Qiskit Ignis.

item.title: Qubit by Qubit Initiative
item.description: Apply for paid and volunteer opportunities at the Qubit by Qubit Initiative. Here are some of their current projects: Developing homework, problem sets, or worksheets Developing middle or high school curricula for quantum Developing or editing content for textbook for high school students Developing quantum workshop for K-12 students Being a Teaching Assistant for intro course Teaching quantum workshops to K-12 students Please reach out to member Shoumik Chowdhury ‘21 to learn more!
